Uses of Interface
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.sort.ISort

  • Packages that use ISort 
    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data
    Interfaces for working with data sources made available by connectors.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.sort
    Interfaces for defining sorting behavior for data sources made available by connectors.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.types
    Specialized interfaces for handling data types.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views
    Interfaces for defining list navigation behavior for data sources made available by connectors.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design
    Services for working with default page types backed by data from default connector types, with default page workflow.

    • Uses of ISort in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data

      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data that return ISort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ISort IListStructure.createSort(Order order, ICell... cells)
      Creates an immutable unidirectional sort definition that can be applied to this list structure.
      ISort IList.getSort()
      Gets the sorting rules that apply to this list, if defined.
      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data with parameters of type ISort 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default IList IFetchable.fetchList(ITicket usingTicket, IFilter filter, ISort sort, IRange range)
      Fetches a list of item references in the specified range matching the specified filter with the specifed sorting rules, as authorized by the privileges of the specified ticket.
      IList IFetchable.fetchList(ITicket usingTicket, IFilter filter, ISort sort, IRange range, EnumSet<Defer> defer)
      Fetches a list of item references in the specified range matching the specified filter with the specifed sorting rules, as authorized by the privileges of the specified ticket, and optionally deferring retrieval of certain categories of data.
      IList IFetchable.fetchList(ITicket usingTicket, IFilter filter, ISort sort, IRange range, Set<ICell> fetchable)
      Fetches a list of item references in the specified range matching the specified filter with the specifed sorting rules, as authorized by the privileges of the specified ticket, initially retrieving only data for the specified set of cells.

    • Uses of ISort in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.sort

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISort ISortBuilder.importSort(InputStream stream)
      Imports a sort definition by reading data from a stream.
      ISort ISortBuilder.importSort(Object representation)
      Imports a sort definition by converting a supported object type to a sort instance.
      ISort ISortBuilder.toSort()
      Creates an immutable sort definition that can be applied to the associated connector data source.
